attributes.action: Corporal punishment, for those tht have murdered no chance of release.
attributes.additional_details:
If such strong consequences were introduced it would hopefully deter so offenders that want status through murder. Further it could give families closure.
Our prisons are over crowded
We have evidence now (cctv, dna, and more) so previous errors in convictions are greatly reduced. 

People cant be slaughtered on are streets and be free in 10 years or less, it isnt good enough.
attributes.background: To be debated, and considered for the introduction to remove evil from the streets, to deter young offenders from gang murder or other, to remove the worst type of danger from society. To reduce prison overcrowdedness and to reduce financial burden from housing said individuals for life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reintroduce the death penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748625
